sense.def:
Kadar se pojavi
a change in something
, tisto postane drugačno.

seg.quote: ...a radical change in attitudes.
...the changes that had taken place since he had left China.
There had been little change.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
changes
ali kadar človek
changes something
, tisto postane drugačno.

seg.quote: Her disdain changed to surprised respect.
They can be used to change uranium into plutonium.
A bird changes direction by dipping one wing and lifting the other.
He returned to parliament a changed man.
...a report on changing fashions in food.

sense.def:
To change something
pomeni tudi nekaj nadomestiti z nečim novim ali drugačnim.

seg.quote: His doctor advised that he change his job.

sense.def:
Kadar se zgodi
a change of something
, se tisto zamenja.

seg.quote: ...a change of government.
That motorcycle needs a change of oil.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
changes his clothes
, si sleče oblačila in nadene druga.

seg.quote: She changed into her street clothes.
I want to change my socks.

sense.def:
A change of clothes
je dodatna obleka, ki jo vzamemo s seboj, kadar nekam potujemo.

To change a baby
ali
to change a baby's nappy
pomeni dojenčku sneti umazano pleničko in ga poviti v svežo.

Kadar človek
changes buses or trains
, izstopi iz enega avtobusa ali vlaka in vstopi v drugega, da bi nadaljeval pot.

seg.quote: Don't forget to change at Crewe.
They were waiting to change trains.

sense.def:
One's change
je denar, ki ga dobimo, kadar nekaj plačamo z več denarja, kot znaša cena.

seg.quote: Morris handed Hooper his change.

sense.def:
Change
so kovanci in ne bankovci.

seg.quote: We only had 80p in change.

sense.def:
Kadar ima človek
change for a note or a large coin
, ima enako vsoto denarja v manjših bankovcih ali kovancih.

seg.quote: Have you got change for a fiver?

sense.def:
To change money
pomeni, da denar zamenjamo za enak znesek v različnih apoenih.

seg.quote: Can anyone change a ten pound note?
Do you change foreign currency?

sense.def:
Če rečemo, da se nekaj zgodi
for a change
, hočemo povedati, da je drugačno od tistega, kar se navadno dogaja.

seg.quote: They were glad to leave their cars and walk for a change.

sense.def:
Kadar neka izkušnja
makes a change
, je prijetna in drugačna od takih, kakršnih smo vajeni.

seg.quote: Being out in the country made a refreshing change.

sense.def:
To change over from one thing to another
pomeni prekiniti eno dejavnost in začeti drugo.

seg.quote: They had been Liberal till several years ago, then they changed over to Conservative.
